page.title: 02OUR TOWN OF RADCLIFFE
page.content:
OUR TOWN IS CALLED RADCLIFFE. IT IS BUILT IN A VALLEY. THERE IS A RIVER RUNNING THROUGH IT CALLED THE RIVER IRWELL. RADCLIFFE HAS A LOT OF SHOPS AND QUITE A FEW SCHOOLS, THERE IS A SWIMMING BATHS A LIBRARY AND A FEW CHURCHES. THERE ARE THREE SUPERMARKETS CALLED "ONE STOP","ASDA" AND "KWIK SAVE" AND LOTS OF HOUSES. I LIVE IN THE NORTHERN PART OF RADCLIFFE IN A TERRACED HOUSE NEAR AN OLD FACTORY AND A FARM, THE CHURCH WE LIVE NEAR IS CALLED ST. ANDREWS AND OUR CHURCH IS CALLED ST. MARY'S. WE START SCHOOL AT 9 o'clock AND WE FINISH AT 3.30.
by ROBERT WIERZBICKI
